column5: Managed to get out last weekend with a couple of buddies in GB.  We hit three rivers, each one was a treat.  Saw a few large fish, but no hookups with the bigger fellas.  The best fish was a 15 inch resident bow, and I'm not complaining about that!!  Nearly all fish were taken on dries, we hit a couple of pretty thick BWO hatches both days, with some larger drakes in the mix as well.  Some pics of the feesh.....                                The big ole Bow!
I've got to suck it up and break out my fly rod before the end of the month.
Yes dude!! you do!!  They're pretty aggressive right now.
Awesome report and pics fish_finder Love those close up shots Thanks for sharing Leechman

Nice! Thanks for reminding me how spoiled I am. I haven't been out to fish the creeks in my area for a while now. Strictly rivers for bass n eyes (which has been good). Only a week left now to hit some local trout. I really should give it a try...
When I see pics like that I wish I was a trout fisherman....they are so beautiful...great job.
Great report,time is running out on a lot of streams. I must get out next week.

Great report as always FF  I made my first trip out for trout last night (since the spring) and had a great night - 4 in 1.5 hours including a beautiful brown in fall colours (17").  I think I'll dedicate this next week to trout for sure.  Cheers, Ryan
Beauty report Dave....  I need to break out the fly rod once more at least before Steelies consume me
